name.ja: <ruby>竜儀巧<rt>ドライトロン</rt></ruby>－メテオニス＝ＤＡＤ

text.en: You can Ritual Summon this with "Meteonis Drytron". Other "Drytron" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Up to twice per turn, when your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can banish "Drytron" monsters from your GY whose total ATK equal or exceed that monster's original ATK; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that monster. If this Ritual Summoned card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 Ritual Monster with 4000 ATK from your hand or Deck. (This is treated as a Ritual Summon.)
